message: Yes

The point is that there were some beta/developing parts of the game that have been shown, based on which the further development phase would be built, depending on the funding. This is such a misleading article. I'm not even into games, but find this highly offensive from an accurate truth point of view. I do hope the title is meant to be read as a sign of hope, people pay that money because they probably want to see the game be made. How can you expect a fully functional game of that size before putting in considerable amounts of money? Just think of the latest GTA with a 1/4 of a billion funding. Have some faith in creativity .

Carter, you earned those beautiful battle scars. Be proud of every one of them. You fought the fierce battle and came out a winner! Our seven year old great granddaughter went through open heart surgery and shows off her scar. God is watching over you, Carter, and even though those scars are visible, you have such beauty on the inside. Those scars will fade in time, not all the way, but everytime you see them in the mirror, just remember that when God brings you to it, He will bring you through it. Good luck, young man, our prayers go out to you. There will be so many kids asking to see them, and admire you for what you have been through.
